description: MonitoringConfig is the Schema for the monitoringconfigs API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: MonitoringConfigSpec defines the desired state of MonitoringConfig.

allowedNamespaces.description: AllowedNamespaces is the list of namespaces where the operator will copy secrets provided in the CredentialsSecretsName.

credentialsSecretName.description: CredentialsSecretName is the name of the secret with credentials.

pmm.description: PMM is configuration for the PMM monitoring type.

image.description: Image is a Docker image name to use for deploying PMM client. Defaults to using the latest version.

url.description: URL is url to the monitoring instance.

verifyTLS.description:
VerifyTLS is set to ensure TLS/SSL verification.
If unspecified, the default value is true.

status.description: MonitoringConfigStatus defines the observed state of MonitoringConfig.

inUse.description: InUse is a flag that indicates if any DB cluster uses the monitoring config.

lastObservedGeneration.description: LastObservedGeneration is the most recent generation observed for this MonitoringConfig.
